# intsvy

**intsvy** provides tools for analyzing data from international assessments

# Installation 

## CRAN

```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("intsvy")
```

## GitHub

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library("devtools")
install_github("eldafani/intsvy")
```

+ PISA 2022
+ PIRLS 2021
+ TIMSS 2019
